metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36046 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
XMP Toolkit version 2020.1 (and earlier) is affected by a memory corruptionvulnerability, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in thecontext of the current user. User interaction is required to exploit thisvulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36046` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.4.5-2ubuntu0.1
libexempi3 - 2.4.5-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.5-2ubuntu0.1').
